FUNCTION_BLOCK fileSave
VAR_INPUT
    filePath : STRING;    // Path to save the file
    intervalt : INT;      // Time interval for saving (in milliseconds)
END_VAR

    fileHandle : INT;     // File handle for writing
END_VAR

    END_IF
    
    // Reset timer
    timer(IN := FALSE);

END_FUNCTION_BLOCK
